content: Singaporean singer (born 1980) **Olinda Cho Yu Yen** (born 24 May 1980) is a Singaporean singer, actress and entrepreneur. ## Career Cho emerged as the second runner-up of the first season of *[Singapore Idol](/wiki/Singapore_Idol)* in 2004. Cho released her debut album, *Rewind*, in October 2007. She also rearranged songs including the Singapore national anthem, [Majulah Singapura](/wiki/Majulah_Singapura), which was broadcast for Starhub's national day commercial, Majulah Moms. In 2016, Cho participated in the Singaporean audition for [the first season](/wiki/Sing!_China_(season_1)) of *[Sing! China](/wiki/Sing!_China)*, and emerged as the winner for the Singapore stop. Cho was approached directly by *Sing! China* to participate in [the second season](/wiki/Sing!_China_(season_2)) in 2017. She performed "不能说的秘密" during the blind audition and won [Na Ying](/wiki/Na_Ying), [Liu Huan](/wiki/Liu_Huan) and [Jay Chou](/wiki/Jay_Chou)'s votes. She joined [Jay Chou](/wiki/Jay_Chou)'s team and became one of the top 4 contestants. In 2025, Cho auditioned for the fourth season of *Midlife, Sing & Shine*. ## Business ventures In September 2013, Cho started a modelling agency, NU Models, with [Sheila Sim](/wiki/Sheila_Sim_(Singaporean_actress)). During the [COVID-19 pandemic](/wiki/COVID-19_pandemic), Cho switched to selling premium fruits. In September 2023, it was reported that Cho is currently in charge of training [Uzbekistan](/wiki/Uzbekistan)'s beauty pageant would-be contestants, and holds a National Director position for the role. ## Discography ### Studio albums - *Rewind* (2007) ## Filmography ### Television series - *[Shooting Stars](/wiki/Shooting_Stars_(Singaporean_TV_series))* (2005) - Olinda Cho at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This article about a Singaporean singer is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Olinda Cho
